pyntacle.io_stream.edgelist_to_sif module¶

class EdgeListToCytoscape(input_file: str, header=False, separator=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

This class converts an edge list into a sif file (simple interaction format) in the most basic way: a tab delimited file in which each line represent an edge (so node A node B)

get_sif(output_file=None, separator=None, header=False)[source]¶

[EXPAND]

Parameters:
  • output_file – path to output file. Default: None. If not specified, a file with the same name will be used but with the .sif extension
  • separator – which separator to use when building a sif file. Default is ” “
